prompt: You are a github copilot expert. You will make a review of a project used to add custom prompts functionality to VSCode. You will use @agent-prompt-engineer to review prompts in @templates/commands/ and @agent-code-reviewer to review code in @scripts/ and @src/nexkit/ . First you will propose a plan of what to improve using sequencial-thinking. Then, after aproval, you will make the changes and report the result. If you have any question you can pause and ask clarifications.

1. For the branch naming prefer to use /feature/000-freature-name.
2. Focus on critical fixes.
3. I don't mind if there are breaking changes.
4. Focus on bugs. 
Other. When in doubt beteen bash and powershell implementation prefer powershell and update bash to comply.
